review: I am totally in love with my Fire TV stick. I recently checked into adding an additional cable hookup in my sewing studio and the price was extremely high. My teen age boys had seen an advertisement for the Fire TV Stick and told me to check into it. Well I took the leap and bought it and have been pleased with it since day one. It was so simple to install and set up and very simple to bring over my Hulu Plus, Netflix and Vudu accounts. Plus my Amazon Prime works like a charm!!!
